Secretary Job at Pyfinest Resources




        
    

        
        Pyfinest Resources - Our client, a reputable solar power solutions provider in Abuja, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Our client is seeking a young, presentable, and tech-savvy Secretary to manage secretarial duties and provide administrative support.
	This role also requires basic content creation skills to assist in the company’s digital presence.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage calls, correspondence, and office documentation
	Maintain schedules, appointments, and filing systems
	Provide clerical support to the management team
	Assist in creating simple content (emails, social media posts, reports)


Candidate Profile


	OND / HND / Bachelor’s in Business Admin, Secretarial Studies, or related field
	Must be computer literate (MS Office, email, internet tools)
	Fair knowledge of content creation (social media, Canva, or similar tools)
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Well-organized, presentable, and detail-oriented
	Must be 26 years or younger.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: pyfinest.hr@gmail.com using “ElecSecretary – Solar Abuja” as the subject of the email.

Visual / Graphics Designer Job at Passnownow




        
    

        
        Passnownow is a leading educational platform dedicated to transforming the learning experience for students in Nigeria and beyond. We provide innovative and accessible digital learning solutions that empower students, teachers, and parents. As we continue to grow and expand our impact, we are seeking a talented and experienced Product/Project Manager to join our dynamic team and lead our product development and project management efforts.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Visual / Graphics Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type:  Full-Time, on-site

Description
     

            
    




	As we grow our visual presence, we’re looking for a creative and versatile Visual/Graphics Designer to produce high-quality designs that align with our mission, engage our audience, and elevate our brand.


Objective


	To create compelling visual assets that support Passnownow’s brand identity, learning content, marketing campaigns, and product visuals across digital and print formats.


Key Responsibilities


	Design visuals for social media, web pages, blog posts, ads, and marketing campaigns
	Create graphics and layouts for learning materials, presentations, and infographics
	Support the UI/UX team with icons, illustrations, and brand-consistent assets
	Ensure all visual content adheres to brand guidelines and communicates clearly
	Contribute to the evolution of the brand’s visual identity and storytelling
	Prepare files for web, mobile, and print use as needed


KPI & Performance Metrics:


	Timely delivery of high-quality visual assets
	Engagement metrics on visual content (clicks, shares, views, etc.)
	Consistency and adherence to brand identity across all platforms
	Internal feedback from content, marketing, and design teams


Collaboration & Approval Workflows:


	Reports to the Head of Operations and Creative Lead
	Works closely with marketing, content, and UI/UX teams
	All visual assets must be reviewed and approved by the creative or marketing lead


Quality Control Expectations:


	Visually polished, error-free, and brand-aligned deliverables
	Appropriate formatting for each platform/use-case
	Responsive adjustments to feedback and creative iterations


Required Skills


	Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design work
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) or similar tools
	Basic motion graphics or animation skills (e.g., After Effects, Canva animations) is a plus
	Good understanding of typography, layout, and visual hierarchy
	Ability to take creative direction and deliver under tight deadlines.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should please send their authentic, brief but concise CV to: people@risenetworks.org using the Job Position as the subject of the emai.

Note: Only qualified Candidates will be contacted.

Executive Assistant Job at eHealth4everyone




        
    

        
        eHealth4everyone is a digital health enterprise based in Nigeria (Africa) contributing to health service delivery using data science and information technology. At ehealth4everyone, our goal is saving lives and our approach is information and technology. We believe that if health is a right, proven digital health solutions and expertise such as ours should not be a privilege.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Description
     

            
    




	The Executive Assistant role is to help assist the CEO to expand, develop and manage the business efficiently and effectively.
	S/he may at times be required to act on behalf of the CEO, serve as the first point of contact with clients, internal staff and other business contacts.
	We seek someone with a high level of organization, passion for tech, leadership potential and the ability to provide outstanding administrative support with hands-on experience with required tools/ software.


Responsibilities


	Preparing reports, memos, and other documents.
	Calendar management using MS Teams, Google Meet etc.
	Answering phones and routing calls/ taking messages to the right team member..
	Filing and retrieving corporate records, documents, and reports.
	Researching and conducting data to prepare documents for review and presentation by CEO & Management. Helping prepare for meetings and facilitating them.
	Accurately recording minutes from meetings. Using various software, including word processing, spreadsheets, databases, and presentation software.
	Reading and analyzing incoming faxes, mails, memos, submissions, and distributing them as needed.
	Provide general administrative support.


Qualification and Skills


	Candidates must have at least a Degree. Degree in Law, Business or administration related course is an added advantage.
	Candidates must be tech savvy with a minimum of 3 years of experience in a related role.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks.
	Great attention to details.
	Great verbal and written communication skills.
